last_episode_to_air.name: Ragnarok (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: After a major miscalculation by Tom in 225 leaves the fate of the Realms in jeopardy, Jun and the riders rally behind Tom and Thunder to face off against the World Serpent.

name: Dragons: The Nine Realms
overview: Set 1,300 years after the events of How to Train Your Dragon, dragons are now just a legend to the modern world. When a geological anomaly opens an immense, miles-deep fissure in the Earth’s surface, scientists from all over the world gather at a new research facility to study the mysterious phenomenon. Soon a group of misfit kids, brought to the site by their parents, uncover the truth about dragons and where they’ve been hiding -- a secret they must keep to themselves to protect what they’ve discovered.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: Now that the dragon secret has been revealed to ICARIS, having rambunctious dragons in town is a big adjustment for everyone, especially Tom as he struggles to maintain peace and live up to his legacy as the Dragon Whisperer. The Riders discover a new Giant Realm that changes their perspective as they meet some of the biggest dragons in the Hidden World. Someone is mining Dragonsite and putting dragons in harm’s way and Tom and the Riders have to figure out who it is, and Buzzsaw goes all in, targeting Thunder with his most nefarious plot yet, one that puts our loveable hero dragon’s very life in jeopardy.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: As the threat of Buzzsaw looms over Rakke town, the Riders must get the Book of Dragons out of his malicious hands to protect dragonkind. Sledkin’s dragonsite operation uncovers a new realm along with the formidable Glass Caster dragon. As tensions rise in Dragon Club the heroes must band together to become stronger than ever, as riders and friends.

episodes.name: First Flight (1)
episodes.overview: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

episodes.name: First Flight (2)
episodes.overview: Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

episodes.name: A Hole New World
episodes.overview: Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own – Wu and Wei.

episodes.name: Dragon Club
episodes.overview: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D’Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D’Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

episodes.name: Featherhide
episodes.overview: Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young “cloaking” dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a Alex.

episodes.name: Fault Ripper
episodes.overview: Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it's revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

episodes.name: Uniconned
episodes.overview: Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

episodes.name: Magma Breather
episodes.overview: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

episodes.name: Dragons of the Undead
episodes.overview: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

episodes.name: Downpour
episodes.overview: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

episodes.name: The Tangled Web
episodes.overview: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

episodes.name: Follow the Lightning (1)
episodes.overview: Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D’Angelo and Alex.

episodes.name: Follow the Lightning (2)
episodes.overview: Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

episodes.name: Fire Escape
episodes.overview: Tom hatches an unorthodox plan to use a Monstrous Nightmare to test Alex's new fire suit, endangering the secret of dragons.

episodes.name: Ride or Die
episodes.overview: After a fight with her mom, Jun joins Tom on an adventure into the Fire Realm, where her knowledge of myths saves the day.

episodes.name: Empty Fireworm Nest
episodes.overview: When a tiny Fireworm dragon ends up at ICARIS, Alex must decide between her mom's excitement and keeping the dragon secret.

episodes.name: Dr. Catastrophe
episodes.overview: During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native realm, D'Angelo accidentally feeds them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

episodes.name: It Flies in the Family
episodes.overview: Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

episodes.name: Magma Comes to the Surface
episodes.overview: The dragon riders must sneak a very sick Magma Breather into the ICARIS infirmary.

episodes.name: The Sky Torcher
episodes.overview: The Sky Torcher and Flame Throwers invade the Crystal Realm; Tom must conquer his demons and bond with the Fault Ripper to defeat the Sky Torcher.

episodes.name: Cold Open
episodes.overview: Tom and the riders discover the Ice Realm and find Buzzsaw inside.

episodes.name: Uncharted Territory
episodes.overview: Alex and Eugene find themselves at odds with Tom and their fellow dragon riders when Feathers and Webmaster go missing during a blizzard in the Ice Realm.

episodes.name: Journey to the Snowcano
episodes.overview: Jun struggles to convince Tom to trust her faith in myths over the Book of Dragons when they venture to a place that his book seems to say is extremely dangerous.

episodes.name: The Decoy
episodes.overview: Tom’s leadership abilities come into question by Eugene when his decisions lead to failure while attempting to confront Buzzsaw.

episodes.name: The Night Lights (1)
episodes.overview: Tom and Thunder discover a baby Nightlight and must bring him back to Thunder’s home realm.

episodes.name: The Night Lights (2)
episodes.overview: When Thunder’s clan of fellow Nightlights is attacked by the Snow Wraith, Tom vows to rescue them.

episodes.name: Punishment and Torcher
episodes.overview: While punished, Tom must sneak out to rescue the Riders from Buzzsaw.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Wonderful World of Dragons
episodes.overview: Tom orchestrates a “safe” tour of the realms to convince Olivia that the Hidden World is safe for them to explore.

episodes.name: Barrel of Vine Tails
episodes.overview: A mischievous new breed of dragons called Vine Tails steal the Book of Dragons.

episodes.name: Scent of a Dragon
episodes.overview: Tom and the riders must work together to rescue Eugene from a dragon’s nest.

episodes.name: Sting It On!
episodes.overview: Tom must rescue Olivia from the Hidden World when she winds up getting herself frozen by a pack of hungry Speed Stingers.

episodes.name: Deep Freeze
episodes.overview: When a deep freeze puts the lives of everyone in Rakke Town in jeopardy, the riders must attempt to use the dragons to get the humans through the night without being seen.

episodes.name: Dragons Everywhere!
episodes.overview: Tom struggles under the pressure of being the new ‘Dragon Whisperer’ for Rakke Town; Thunder rises to the occasion to help him.

episodes.name: Break in Case of Emergency
episodes.overview: When the parents leave for the night and tell the riders not to bring the dragons to the surface while they’re gone, D’Angelo and Eugene get locked in the hangar (with the dragons!) after Eugene triggers a security lockdown.

episodes.name: Undercover
episodes.overview: Jun forms an unlikely connection with Sledkin.

episodes.name: Webs' Masters
episodes.overview: Eugene’s bond with Webmaster is put to the test when Webmaster leaves the group for a pack of Deathgrippers.

episodes.name: Sledkin Stakeout
episodes.overview: Tom sets out to prove Sledkin caused an explosion that injured a dragon in the Hidden World.

episodes.name: Poison Control
episodes.overview: When the dragons fall victim to Buzzsaw’s poison darts, D struggles to keep a cool head and find a cure while others panic.

episodes.name: In Too Deep
episodes.overview: Tom and the riders “borrow” the bathysphere to rescue a dragon from the depths of the Giant Realm Sea.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: Now that the dragon secret has been revealed to ICARIS, having rambunctious dragons in town is a big adjustment for everyone, especially Tom as he struggles to maintain peace and live up to his legacy as the Dragon Whisperer. The Riders discover a new Giant Realm that changes their perspective as they meet some of the biggest dragons in the Hidden World. Someone is mining Dragonsite and putting dragons in harm’s way and Tom and the Riders have to figure out who it is, and Buzzsaw goes all in, targeting Thunder with his most nefarious plot yet, one that puts our loveable hero dragon’s very life in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Hobs and Saw
episodes.overview: When Phil threatens to shut down D’Angelo’s new dragon hospital and ban dragons from ICARIS, D’Angelo and a little Hobgobbler have to change his mind.

episodes.name: Hearts of Heroes
episodes.overview: While Tom struggles with admitting his feelings for Jun, the pair find themselves trapped inside a giant tree with an anxious colony of Woodchipper dragons.

episodes.name: Hearts of Glass
episodes.overview: Thunder must wrangle and lead the Hero Dragons in a desperate attempt to save Tom and the riders from a dangerous new dragon, The Glass Caster.

episodes.name: In the Cards
episodes.overview: When Jun does a Tarot reading for the team, she interprets its meaning to be that the riders will disband! In an effort to defy this fate, Jun forces the group to stick together as they search for a dragon that has breached the Rakke Town eel barrier.

episodes.name: Eugene's Lean Mean Extreme Dream Team
episodes.overview: With the dragon riders disbanded, Eugene attempts to start his own Dragon Club.

episodes.name: Alex Not Found
episodes.overview: When Thunder accidentally fries Alex’s tablet, Alex goes off on her own and is captured by Buzzsaw.

episodes.name: Rise of Jörmungandr
episodes.overview: Tom and the riders must finally overcome their differences and come together as a team to survive the Dark Realm.

7.name: Season 7
7.overview: As the threat of Buzzsaw looms over Rakke town, the Riders must get the Book of Dragons out of his malicious hands to protect dragonkind. Sledkin’s dragonsite operation uncovers a new realm along with the formidable Glass Caster dragon. As tensions rise in Dragon Club the heroes must band together to become stronger than ever, as riders and friends.

episodes.name: How to Train Jörmungandr
episodes.overview: Tom attempts to defeat the World Serpent by emulating Hiccup.

episodes.name: The Great Foster Fake-Out
episodes.overview: Tom and the dragon riders foster displaced Hidden Realm dragons in Rakke Town but things get complicated when Mr. Rakke makes a surprise visit.

episodes.name: Science Vs. Nature
episodes.overview: The Dragon riders enlist the aid of Carla and Hazel and their scientific knowledge to help them prepare for a mission to neutralize Jörmungandr so they can return him to his chamber and seal him back inside.

episodes.name: Of Gods and Monsters
episodes.overview: Tom and the riders must rescue Plowhorn from Sledkin when the villain abducts the dragon to help her find the Gods Realm and the Dragonsite jewel.

episodes.name: Ragnarok (1)
episodes.overview: Tom’s overconfidence turns to frustration then despair as he struggles to procure the ingredients for Gronckle Iron in hopes of building a trap to stop the World Serpent.

episodes.name: Ragnarok (2)
episodes.overview: After a major miscalculation by Tom in 225 leaves the fate of the Realms in jeopardy, Jun and the riders rally behind Tom and Thunder to face off against the World Serpent.
